mapper.select: select p.id, p.project_name projectName, d1.dict_code dictCode from sop_project p left join dict d1 on p.project_status=d1.dict_code where p.id=#{projectId};
mapper.insert:
insert into sop_task ( id, project_id, task_name, task_type, task_flag, task_order, task_deadline, department_id, assign_uid, task_status, remark, created_time, updated_time ) values ( #{id}, #{projectId}, #{taskName}, #{taskType}, #{taskFlag}, #{taskOrder}, #{taskDeadline}, #{departmentId}, #{assignUid}, #{taskStatus}, #{remark}, #{createdTime}, #{updatedTime} );
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS id
mapper.select: SELECT r.id, date_format(r.meeting_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') meetingDate, d1.name meetingResult, r.meeting_type meetingType FROM sop_meeting_record r left join dict d1 on r.meeting_result=d1.dict_code WHERE r.project_id=#{projectId} and r.meeting_type=#{meetingType} and r.meet_valid = 0 ORDER BY r.meeting_date desc LIMIT 1;

SELECT id, concat(file_name,'.',file_suffix) as fileName, file_suffix fileSuffix, file_key fileKey, created_time fileTime FROM sop_file WHERE file_valid=1 and project_id=#{projectId} and file_worktype=#{fileWorkType} ORDER BY created_time DESC LIMIT 1;
mapper.insert: insert into sop_meeting_scheduling ( id, project_id, meeting_type, meeting_count, meeting_date, status, remark, schedule_status, apply_time, reserve_time_start, reserve_time_end, last_time, updated_time, created_time ) values ( #{id}, #{projectId}, #{meetingType}, #{meetingCount}, #{meetingDate}, #{status}, #{remark}, #{scheduleStatus}, #{applyTime}, #{reserveTimeStart}, #{reserveTimeEnd}, #{lastTime}, #{updatedTime}, #{createdTime} )

insert into sop_file ( project_id, belong_uid, file_valid, project_progress, file_worktype, career_line, file_source, file_type, remark, voucher_id, file_status, file_uid, fil_uri, updated_time, created_time, file_length, file_key, bucket_name, file_name, file_suffix, record_type, meeting_id ) values ( #{projectId}, #{belongUid}, #{fileValid}, #{projectProgress}, #{fileWorkType}, #{careerLine}, #{fileSource}, #{fileType}, #{remark}, #{voucherId}, #{fileStatus}, #{fileUid}, #{filUri}, #{createdTime}, #{createdTime}, #{fileLength}, #{fileKey}, #{bucketName}, #{fileName}, #{fileSuffix}, #{recordType}, #{meetingId} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS id
mapper.select: SELECT p.id, p.project_name projectName, p.project_type projectType, p.project_progress projectProgress, p.project_status projectStatus, p.project_departId projectDepartId, p.create_uid createUid, p.progress_history progressHistory, p.business_type_code businessTypeCode, d.`name` projectProgressName FROM sop_project p LEFT JOIN dict d ON p.project_progress=d.dict_code WHERE p.id=#{projectId};
mapper.update: update sop_file set file_valid=0 where id = #{id};
mapper.insert: insert into information_result ( id, project_id, title_id, content_choose, content_describe1, content_describe2, sort, created_time, create_id, updated_time, update_id ) values ( #{id}, #{projectId}, #{titleId}, #{contentChoose}, #{contentDescribe1}, #{contentDescribe2}, #{sort}, #{createdTime}, #{createId}, #{createdTime}, #{createId} )
mapper.select: SELECT f.id, f.project_id projectId, f.project_progress projectProgress, d1.name progress, f.file_suffix fileSuffix, f.file_key fileKey, f.bucket_name bucketName, f.file_name fileName, f.file_length fileLength, f.file_type fileType, d2.name fType, f.file_worktype fileWorktype, d3.name fWorktype, f.file_status fileStatus, d4.name fileStatusDesc, f.file_source fileSource, case f.file_source WHEN 1 THEN '内部' WHEN 2 THEN '外部' else '' END fSource, f.record_type recordType, f.created_time createdTime, f.file_uid fileUid, f.career_line careerLine, u.user_name fileUName, d.name careerLineName FROM sop_file f LEFT JOIN dict d1 on f.project_progress=d1.dict_code LEFT JOIN dict d2 on f.file_type=d2.dict_code LEFT JOIN dict d3 on f.file_worktype=d3.dict_code LEFT JOIN dict d4 on f.file_status=d4.dict_code LEFT JOIN v_user u on u.id=f.file_uid LEFT JOIN v_department d on f.career_line=d.id WHERE f.project_id=#{projectId} and f.file_worktype=#{fileWorkType} and f.file_valid=1 ORDER BY f.created_time DESC LIMIT 1;
